Song.title: You Made Us Your Own
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve & Vikki Cook, and Bob Kauflin © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship/Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: We were [C]ruined [Csus]in our [C]sin,{,} we were [C]guilty [Csus]and un[C]done When Your [Em]love reached down{,} with[F] sovereign hands And [Dm]beckoned us to [F]come Verse 2: You sought [C]out the [Csus]wander[C]ers Made the [C]prodi[Csus]gals come [C]home With a [Em]lavish feast You [F]welcomed us For [Dm]You made [G]us Your [D]own
Chorus: You have [G]loved [Am]us{,} [F]like You love Your [C | C]Son We are [G]heirs [Am]with [F]Christ,{,} bought by Hi[Dm7]s blood [G] [C/E]Oh how [G]great [Am]the [F]love{,} that we’ve been [C]shown We’re Your [Dm Em]children [F]now, You made us Your [C | C]own
Verse 3: We are [C]strangers [Csus]to the [C]world But no [C]strangers [Csus]to Your [C]throne We draw [Em]near You now with [F]confidence For [Dm]all our fears are [F]gone
Verse 4: And when [C]Christ our [Csus]King re[C]turns We’ll meet [C]saints we’ve [Csus]never [C]known And for[Em]ever we will [F]be amazed That [Dm]You made [G]us Your [C]own
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 we were ruined in our sin we were guilty and undone when your love reached down with sovereign hands and beckoned us to come verse 2 you sought out the wanderers made the prodigals come home with a lavish feast you welcomed us for you made us your own chorus you have loved us like you love your son we are heirs with christ bought by his blood oh how great the love that weve been shown were your children now you made us your own verse 3 we are strangers to the world but no strangers to your throne we draw near you now with confidence for all our fears are gone verse 4 and when christ our king returns well meet saints weve never known and forever we will be amazed that you made us your own
